I burned NTSC (US) using Nero Vision.  I can't select menus, and it jumps right in to Spanish.  I don't think PAL is supported on standard US DVD players and/or TVs (tell me if I am wrong.)

Also, audio does not seem to want to play in digital audio mode - only plays center channel.  I'm sure I am doing something wrong.


Has anyone else had this problem?  How did you fix it?  Thanks!  And thanks for the upload skafa.
